transcript: Everybody's told the same story. It keeps us coming back for more. It keeps us excited. Keep thinking that life is gonna start at any minute, you know, if we can just find the right spot, get in on the action.

Keep thinking that life is gonna start at any minute, you know, if we can just find the right spot, get in on the action.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Everybody's told the same story.  It keeps us coming back for more, it keeps us excited.  We keep thinking that life is going start at any minute if we can just find the right spot, get in on the action.
